      • openStream

        public IStream openStream(UUID id)
        Opens a stream given it's identifier using this instance, or creates it on this instance if one does not exist.
        Specified by:
        openStream in interface ICorfuDBInstance
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be opened.
        Returns:
        The stream, if it exists. Otherwise, a new stream is created using this instance.

      • deleteStream

        public boolean deleteStream(UUID id)
        Delete a stream given its identifier using this instance.
        Specified by:
        deleteStream in interface ICorfuDBInstance
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be deleted.
        Returns:
        True, if the stream was successfully deleted, or false if there was an error deleting the stream (does not exist).

      • openObject

        public <T extends ICorfuDBObject> T openObject(UUID id,
                                               ICorfuDBInstance.OpenObjectArgs<T> oargs,
                                               Class<?>... args)
        Retrieves a corfuDB object.
        Specified by:
        openObject in interface ICorfuDBInstance
        Parameters:
        id - A unique ID for the object to be retrieved.
        type - The type of object to instantiate.
        args - A list of arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        A CorfuDB object. A cached object may be returned if one already exists in the system. A new object will be created if one does not already exist.

      • executeTransaction

                                ITransactionCommand<T> command)

        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of transaction to execute.
        command - The command to run in the transaction.
        Returns:
